name: Schrodingus
description:
to select a level on the main menu press the left or right arrow key and then press the up arrow key to play.

ghost cat - controlled with arrow keys, can pass through lasers

live cat - controlled with WASD

laser - can be passed through by ghost cat and disabled by button

camera - ends level when touched by live cat

font source - https://www.dafont.com/retro-gaming.font

all sprites and audio where made by me using aseprite and sfxr
